In this session we will explore some data about emergency calls for service (e.g., ambulance) that were scraped from [P2000](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P2000_(network)) communication websites. The session will focus on handling dates (i.e., DD-MM-YYYY HMS) and visualization.

## Material

The material for the session is available [here](https://github.com/langtonhugh/rum_umc/blob/main/session_material/scripts/session6.R).
